attributes.action: stop charities being able to donate to political parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Certain charities such as as the Joseph Rowntree Foundation have a large influence on political parties by giving large donations. Should a charity which is supposed to be non political have such influence?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
